Interface RMIRemoteServerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMIServerImplementation

    public interface RMIRemoteServerInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Author:
    Andrea Folini

      take the request to add a client to the main server and check that the username is accepted

    • Method Detail

      • addClient

        void addClient(RMIRemoteClientInterface client,
               java.lang.String firstUsername)
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        take the request to add a client to the main server and check that the username is accepted
        Parameters:
        client - the remote reference of the client that wants to join the server
        firstUsername - the name that the new client wants to use
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - caused by an rmi connection error

      • sendToServer

        void sendToServer(ViewControllerEvent viewControllerEvent,
                  int lobbyNumber)
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        send the event from the client to the main server
        Parameters:
        viewControllerEvent - the event that will be send
        lobbyNumber - the lobby number of the client that sended the event
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - caused by an rmi connection error

      • ping

        void ping()
   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        empty method used to catch connection error
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - caused by an rmi connection error

      • reconnect

        void reconnect(java.lang.String username,
               int lobbyNumber)
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        send to main server the reconnection request from the client
        Parameters:
        username - name of the clietn
        lobbyNumber - lobby number of the client
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - caused by an rmi connection error
